# website

Marketing website for RunCmd, built with Astro and Tailwind CSS, deployed to GitHub Pages.

## Stack

- **Framework**: Astro 4.15.0 (static site generator)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with PostCSS and Autoprefixer
- **Runtime**: Bun >= 1.3.5 (package manager required)
- **TypeScript**: ~5.9.3 with Astro type checking
- **Deployment**: GitHub Pages via repository-level `public/` directory

## Scripts

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `bun run dev` | Start dev server at <http://localhost:4321> |
| `bun run build` | Build static files to `../public` |
| `bun run preview` | Preview production build |
| `bun run lint` | Run ESLint |
| `bun run check` | Run Astro type checks |

## Contents

### Source Files

- [src/pages/index.astro](./src/pages/index.astro) — Homepage with hero, features grid, documentation sections
- [src/pages/docs.astro](./src/pages/docs.astro) — Documentation page
- [src/layouts/BaseLayout.astro](./src/layouts/BaseLayout.astro) — Main layout component
- [src/components/Nav.astro](./src/components/Nav.astro) — Navigation component
- [src/styles/global.css](./src/styles/global.css) — Global styles

### Configuration

- [package.json](./package.json) — Project dependencies and scripts
- [astro.config.mjs](./astro.config.mjs) — Astro config with Tailwind integration, output to `../public`
- [tailwind.config.js](./tailwind.config.js) — Tailwind content扫描 `.astro` and `.css` files
- [tsconfig.json](./tsconfig.json) — Target ES2020, module ESNext
- [eslint.config.js](./eslint.config.js) — ESLint rules for Astro + TypeScript
- [postcss.config.js](./postcss.config.js) — PostCSS setup

### Documentation

- [README.md](./README.md) — Setup, tech stack, and deployment instructions

## Architecture

Astro static site with component-based architecture. Pages in `src/pages/` use layouts from `src/layouts/` and components from `src/components/`. Static assets served from `public/`. Version loaded from `../version.txt` at build time.

## Browser Support

Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+, Edge 90+; requires ES2020+, CSS Grid/Flexbox/CSS Variables
